name: @alheimsins/b5-inventory
description: Big five inventory for the Alheimsins modules

scripts.coveralls: nyc ava && nyc report --reporter=lcov && cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.refresh: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm install
